alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Nemaha (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 9:14PM CDT until May 07 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Nemaha County in northeastern Kansas... Northeastern Marshall County in northeastern Kansas... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 914 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Summerfield, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Beattie, Bern and Summerfield. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
